prod_desc: Enjoy a tea party with Belle and her extraordinary friends!
prod_long_desc:
Enter the kitchen of the enchanted castle to sing and dance with Disney’s Belle and her new friends. Disney Beauty and the Beast fans will love to role-play scenes from the movie or create new stories of their own. Develop early construction skills with this easy-to-build LEGO® DUPLO® Disney toy full of much-loved characters and decorated bricks to bring the magic to life. Includes a LEGO® DUPLO® figure: Belle, plus Mrs. Potts, Chip and Cogsworth figures.
Includes a LEGO® DUPLO® figure: Belle, plus Mrs. Potts, Chip and Cogsworth figures.
Features a fireplace with opening door and a table with 2 chairs.
Host an enchanted tea party in the castle kitchen!
Play out endless role-play stories with much-loved characters from Disney Beauty and the Beast.
Help your child master basic construction skills with this easy-to-build LEGO® DUPLO® Disney toy.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be fun and easy for little hands.
Suitable for ages 2-5.
Fireplace measures over 5” high, 4” high and 2” long.
